title: Exploring the JetBrains AI Assistant for Visual Studio Code
author: David Eastman
description: JetBrains is primarily known for its Java-based IDE, IntelliJ — so why has the company released a VS Code extension for its AI Assistant?
cntitle: 探索 Visual Studio Code 的 JetBrains AI助手
cndescription: JetBrains 主要以其基于 Java 的 IDE IntelliJ 而闻名——那么，该公司为何要为其 AI 助手发布 VS Code 扩展呢？
